data.title: Partitionware Selects Dialogic® DSI STP Solution to Extend Networking Services
data.text:
Dialogic STP solution extends network reach while providing greater flexibility and reliability

Parsippany, NJ (October 18, 2016) - Dialogic, a cloud-optimized applications and infrastructure solutions provider for service providers, enterprises, and developers, announced today that Partitionware Limited, a leading provider of innovative networking solutions for the telecom industry, has deployed the Dialogic® DSI Signaling Transfer Point (STP) as part of its portfolio of managed services for network operators.

Partitionware selected Dialogic’s DSI STP solution in order to extend its service offerings with powerful new routing capabilities that are critical to both mobile and virtual network operators. In particular, the Dialogic STP solution enables Partitionware to support more signaling interconnection points with more operators, extending its network reach and providing greater flexibility for its customers.

“Dialogic’s DSI signaling products have always been key to providing robust and scalable services to our customers, so they were an obvious choice when selecting an STP vendor. Their STP provides us with an agile foundation for rapid business growth, while retaining the flexibility and reliability we have come to rely on,” commented Mike Bromwich, CEO of Partitionware. “Dialogic’s extensive experience in providing real-time telecom signaling solutions and its focus on carrier-class, software-based platforms were extremely important to us.”

The need for telecom service providers to adapt has never been greater, and Dialogic is laser focused on providing its customers with solutions that help them achieve rapid network evolution. The Dialogic Signaling Transfer Point solution deployed by Partitionware utilizes the Dialogic® DSI G51 Signaling Controller platform. The DSI G5x is available as a turnkey hardware appliance or a virtualized software-only solution in order to enable agile scalability, either on-premises or in the cloud.

“We are delighted that Partitionware selected Dialogic’s DSI G51 Signaling Controller in order to extend its carrier-class managed services portfolio,” said Jim Machi, Senior VP of Product Management and Marketing at Dialogic. “Partitionware builds and manages customized telecom services for network operators across a range of markets. By deploying the Dialogic DSI STP, Partitionware can create unique signaling and core routing services for customers today with confidence that platform capacity can be rapidly expanded as traffic increases in the future.”

To learn more about Dialogic’s Signaling Controllers and STPs, please go to the product webpage.

About Partitionware

Partitionware provides managed telecom services for ambitious service providers and operators that want to innovate quickly, get to market fast and need a collaborator that can help them to deliver new services and reduce costs, through a unique, consultative approach that minimizes risk.

Based in the Isle of Man, Partitionware has a long history of innovation and an outstanding track record of success, built on the delivery of successful solutions to MNOs, MVNOs and other service providers from around the world.

About Dialogic

Dialogic is a leading cloud-optimized solutions provider for real-time communications media, applications, and infrastructure to service providers, enterprises, and developers around the globe. Based in Parsippany, NJ with offices worldwide, Dialogic helps 48 of the world’s top 50 mobile operators, and nearly 3,000 application developers build and deploy on agile networks. Learn more about how Dialogic is enabling agility by following us on Twitter @Dialogic, and visiting www.dialogic.com and the Dialogic Blog for the latest industry news, trends and advice.

Dialogic is a registered trademark of Dialogic Corporation or an affiliate or subsidiary thereof (“Dialogic”). Other trademarks mentioned and/or marked herein belong to their respective owners.
